orderItems.label: Order a gazebo
orderItems.description: Book a cozy gazebo near the lake to relax with friends or family. Perfect for picnics, celebrations, or just chilling in nature.

orderItems.label: Order a bike
orderItems.description: Rent a bicycle and explore the park's scenic routes. A fun and healthy way to enjoy your day outdoors.

orderItems.label: Order an electric scooter
orderItems.description: Get around fast and effortlessly with our electric scooters. Eco-friendly, easy to use, and a blast to ride!
